data.content:
Personal resume —-Luoyuan

EDUCATION

2015 - 2019 Chongqing University of Education English Major

Major course: Comprehensive English, English reading and writing, English audio-visual speaking, Convention Translation, Tourism Translation, English National Society and Culture, Computer-aided Translation, Second Foreign Language (French)

INTERNSHIP EXPRIENCE

JUL 2016 Chongqing Sunshine Education Center Trainee

l Responsible for primary and secondary school teaching enrollment and publicity.

AUG 2017 Tonghui Education Trainee Teacher

l Responsible for teaching primary school students English, to help students answer questions.

CAMPUS EXPEIENCE

OCT 2015 - JUN 2016 Student Union Student Union Officer

l Join the student union, and get the title of outstanding officer

OCT 2016 – JUN 2017 Student Union Student union cadre

l Become a student cadre, lead the department to complete the work, and get the title of outstanding student cadres, the department won the title of outstanding departments.

SKILLS&CERTIFICATE

  • PUTONGHUA SHUIPING CESHI: second class grade B
  • College English Test Band 4 (CET-4)
  • Skilled in using all kinds of computer translation software
  • Through the national computer secondary examination, skilled use of office related software
